issue.title: [Python][CI] Filesystem tests failing with s3fs 0.5.2
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11226](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11226). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See eg https://ci.appveyor.com/project/ApacheSoftwareFoundation/arrow/builds/37228135/job/mj3stkb1y0y4knmp?fullLog=true. 

There is no recent s3fs or fsspec release, but since a few hours conda started to install the latest s3fs 0.5.2, instead of the older 0.4.2, as it did before (without that s3fs is being pinned exactly)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11226?focusedCommentId=17264046) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9188
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9188>
